Entry.JapaneseText: ミリッツァを捕まえれば、 <Blue>王の盾<White>の足取りもわかるかもしれん。
Entry.EnglishText: If we catch Militsa, we might learn something about the <Blue>Royal Shield<White>'s movements.

Entry.JapaneseText: ミリッツァは北の出入り口の方へ 逃げていったみたいだぜ！
Entry.EnglishText: It looks like she's headed to the city's north entrance!
